channel.title: Searching for an Coder
channel.description:
Hey guys , i started an own RSPS but i need an coder. If you think you can help me then add me on skype : afcaselim im going to use TrisidiaX source , but if you think there is another good source u can tell it me and then maybe ill use that one.
Thanks guys.

item.title: Searching for an Coder
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

  1. Wrong Section
  2. We are not a spoonfeeding community; we will not do anything for you.
  3. If you want to help code, look in the Development teams section.

Read full topic

item.title: Searching for an Coder
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

selimscape:

dude , 1 i dont make an RSPS for Donations , 2. i can code by my self 3. i thought i can search here for coders. because the board name is SERVER HELP . but i just want extra help so i dont need to do everything by myself

If you would have read the global/section rules you can’t request a coder anywhere on these forums. And this board name is Server Help but moparscape community users are not going to spoon feed you AKA do all the work for you. If you want extra help with coding start a Development Team.

Read full topic

item.title: Searching for an Coder
item.dc:creator: @dwarfs222 dwarfs222
item.description:
@dwarfs222 wrote:

[quote=“Vazzily, post:2, topic:454477”]Alright, so. You joined this community. You decided to start a RSPS. You don’t know how to code, instead you decide to post a Coder request in the wrong section. Then what do you do? Take the donations? Well, actually I don’t think there will be a single donation coming in.

Seems legit.

Firstly, why do you post in the wrong section?
Why do you start a RSPS without experience?
Why do you start a RSPS without knowing how to code?
What would you have done if there was now a coder, what would your job be?
And lastly, why do you think someone would come and code for you just like that?

Don’t reply to my questions.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Searching for an Coder
item.dc:creator: @Vazzily Vazzily
item.description:
@Vazzily wrote:

Alright, so. You joined this community. You decided to start a RSPS. You don’t know how to code, instead you decide to post a Coder request in the wrong section. Then what do you do? Take the donations? Well, actually I don’t think there will be a single donation coming in.

Seems legit.

Firstly, why do you post in the wrong section?
Why do you start a RSPS without experience?
Why do you start a RSPS without knowing how to code?
What would you have done if there was now a coder, what would your job be?
And lastly, why do you think someone would come and code for you just like that?

Don’t reply to my questions.

Read full topic
